revised_title: Mineralogy of Planets: A Voyage in Space and Time
tldr: This article discusses the mineralogy of planets, focusing on the terrestrial planets, and explores their formation and evolution. It covers topics such as planetary differentiation, the role of the solar nebula, and the impact of catastrophic processes on the planets' surfaces and atmospheres. The author also suggests areas for further study, including high-pressure mineralogy, petrology, and the chemistry of early Earth and other planets.
